name: ECTAA, Group of National Travel Agents' and Tour Operators' Associations within the EU
membership: ECTAA is Member of NET, the Network of European Private Enterpreneurs in the Tourism sector.
goal: ECTAA is representing European Travel Agents' and Tour Operators' Associations. It counts among its membership associations of 27 Member States of the European Union as well as associations of Serbia, Montenegro, Norway and Switzerland. All together, ECTAA represents some 80,000 European undertakings.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Package Travel Directive
Passenger Regulations
Data Protection
Visa Package
VAT
Passenger Name Record (PNR)
Competition issues
Insurance Mediation
Collaborative Economy
Digital Single Market
